import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import {Link} from "@reach/router" import axios from "axios" const Login = () => { const [user_name,setUser_name] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const login = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post("http://localhost:8000/login/", { user_name, password }) .then((res) => console.log(res)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } return (

Log in

setUser_name(e.target.value)}/>
setPassword(e.target.value)}/>

) } export default Login {/*
